hard_constraints.description: Compliance standards mandate that each row in the grid must contain exactly one occurrence of every number from 1 to 9.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- val(R), val(V), N = #count { C : val(C), sudoku(R,C,V) }, N != 1.

hard_constraints.description: Operational policy requires that each column in the grid must contain exactly one occurrence of every number from 1 to 9.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- val(C), val(V), N = #count { R : val(R), sudoku(R,C,V) }, N != 1.

hard_constraints.description: Business regulations specify that each 3x3 subgrid must contain exactly one occurrence of every number from 1 to 9.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- val(V), subgrid_index(I), subgrid_index(J), N = #count { R,C : val(R), val(C), sudoku(R,C,V), (R-1)/3 = I, (C-1)/3 = J }, N != 1.
